summary: The client decided to re-run Sprint 1 (SP-001) to iterate or reset. The sprint planning architect analyzed the backlog, confirmed the original stories (US-010, US-001, US-015), provided estimates and rationale, and sought confirmation on proceeding without tweaks.

decisions.title: Re-run Sprint 1 with original stories
decisions.details: Proceed with US-010 (Mock Login Page), US-001 (Employee Directory Search), and US-015 (Add Employee Profile) for foundational UI and data operations, estimated at 20 minutes.

actions.task: Confirm or tweak the proposed sprint stories before re-running SP-001
